Class Album

java.lang.Object
  cs213.photoAlbum.model.Album

public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents an album and all its corresponding information.

Author:
Catalina Laverde Duarte

addPhoto

public boolean addPhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
                        java.lang.String caption,
                        User user)
Adds a new photo to the album. This Photo is a new instance, meaning that the object didn't exits and will be created.

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the photo to be added.
caption - Caption of the photo to be added.
Returns:
Boolean value to check whether the photo was successfully added or not.
Throws:
java.text.ParseException
